name: places/ChIJAQAtpP31wokRnIjv6CIEc_Y
formattedAddress: 475 E 115th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 475 E 115th St, New York, NY 10029-1702, USA

originalText.text: Seems like a good organization with people who really care about their clients. However, despite posting on various forums about their need for volunteers and donations, they never respond to inquiries, not even to say “no thanks.” I’m sure they’re extremely busy, but it seems like they could be meeting a lot more of their clients’ needs if they followed up with the requests *they* make for volunteers, donations, and funding. Perhaps they should hire a volunteer to field these inquiries. I really do not want to retract from the important work they do, but as someone who helps coordinate these things for other organizations in the area, I feel like this is a major oversight on their part that could be easily addressed.

originalText.text: There are no words to describe how thankful I am. When I needed help and information, I was able to count with LSA. Amazing and friendly personnel. Very resourceful and Professionals. Thank you.

originalText.text: Great organization, very helpful, understanding and caring staff.
